channel.title: blog on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Hugo

item.title: Let’s celebrate Hugo’s 5th birthday
item.description: By Bjørn Erik Pedersen (@bepsays / @bep), Hugo Lead Five years ago today, Steve Francia made his first commit on the Hugo project: “Hugo: A Fast and Flexible Static Site Generator built with love by spf13 in GoLang”. Steve was writing that on a train commute to New York. I’m writing this article running Hugo v0.43-DEV, the preview version of the next Hugo release. The release is scheduled for Monday and adds a powerful assets pipeline, with SCSS/SASS support, assets minification, fingerprinting/subresource integrity, ad-hoc image processing and much more.
